creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Augustus L. Searle
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Imperial Ceremonial Wine Ewer with Cup; Ewer, cover and cup carved in form of a couchant phoenix of clear translucent white jade; carved wood bases for each. Set was probably made for Imperial use during the reign of Emperor Ch'ien L'ung.
title: Ceremonial Wine Ewer
